description: The Department of Energy is weighing a $1.6 billion loan guarantee for a plan to reopen the Three Mile Island nuclear plant with Microsoft as its sole customer.
title: Three Mile Island owner seeks taxpayer backing for Microsoft AI deal

description: Are dating apps biased? After an experiment went viral on TikTok, Black women are changing their racial data on dating apps like Hinge to find better matches.
title: Black women say dating apps like Hinge are biased. Now some are testing it.
